title: Max Brooks - The Zombie Survival Guide (epub)
description:
Max Brooks
The Zombie Survival Guide: Complete Protection from the Living Dead
(epub)

The Zombie Survival Guide is your key to survival against the hordes of undead who may be stalking you right now. Fully illustrated and exhaustively comprehensive, this book covers everything you need to know, including how to understand zombie physiology and behavior, the most effective defense tactics and weaponry, ways to outfit your home for a long siege, and how to survive and adapt in any territory or terrain.



Not my scan. I found a rather poorly formatted copy online (thanks to the original uploader anyway!) and proof-read, edited and formatted it.
Comments always welcome.

NOTE:
If you need to convert from epub to other formats (mobi, lit, rtf, etc.) you can use the free program calibre http://calibre-ebook.com/
